text: Guy Darrin Gardner is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. The character was created by John Broome and Gil Kane, and first appeared in Green Lantern #59 (March 1968). == Fictional character biography == He is one of the characters known as Green Lantern, usually in association with the Green Lantern Corps, of which he is a member. The character has also been a member of the superhero team, the Justice League. == In other media == Guy Gardner has been played by Matthew Settle in the television pilot Justice League of America. He will be played by Nathan Fillon in the upcoming movie Superman (2025), set in the DC Universe. Category:DC Comics superheroes
